title: Sean Patrick Maloney Concedes to Mike Lawler in Loss for Democrats
description: Mr. Maloney, who leads the Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee, was seeking to represent a different district after New York’s messy redistricting process.
dc:creator: Jesse McKinley and Nicholas Fandos
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Sean Patrick Maloney, delivering a concession speech on Wednesday, led the Democratic Party’s campaign operation in the House.
